title: Cash-scarce Venezuela sees boom in payment apps
text:
Cash-scarce Venezuela sees boom in payment apps 1:59pm EST - 01:47 
People from vegetable sellers to taxi drivers have registered to use mobile payment applications to attract customers who do not have enough paper money, which is in short supply during the country's economic crisis. Matthew Larotonda reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
People from vegetable sellers to taxi drivers have registered to use mobile payment applications to attract customers who do not have enough paper money, which is in short supply during the country's economic crisis.
